tests.name: Server runs as child
tests.run: timeout 5 strace -e trace=execve -f -o server.trace ./client -p 1 -t 0.004 -e 1 >/dev/null 2>&1; grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace

tests.name: Single datapoint test (1)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; VAL=$(awk -F, '$1 == "0.016" { print $2 }' BIMDC/12.csv); ./client -p 12 -t 0.016 -e 1 | grep -qe ${VAL}

tests.name: Single datapoint test (2)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; VAL=$(awk -F, '$1 == "59.996" { print $3 }' BIMDC/5.csv); ./client -p 5 -t 59.996 -e 2 | grep -qe ${VAL}

tests.name: Multiple datapoint test (1)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -p 9 >/dev/null 2>&1; head -n 1000 BIMDC/9.csv > test.csv; diff -wB test.csv received/x1.csv >/dev/null

tests.name: Multple datapoint test (2)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -p 5 >/dev/null 2>&1; head -n 1000 BIMDC/5.csv > test.csv; diff -wB test.csv received/x1.csv >/dev/null

tests.name: CSV file transfer test (1)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -f 8.csv >/dev/null 2>&1; diff BIMDC/8.csv received/8.csv >/dev/null

tests.name: CSV file transfer test (2)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -f 2.csv >/dev/null 2>&1; diff BIMDC/2.csv received/2.csv >/dev/null

tests.name: CSV file transfer test (3)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -f 11.csv -m 512 >/dev/null 2>&1; diff BIMDC/11.csv received/11.csv >/dev/null

tests.name: Binary file transfer test (1)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -f test.bin >/dev/null 2>&1; diff BIMDC/test.bin received/test.bin >/dev/null

tests.name: Binary file transfer test (2)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; ./client -f test.bin -m 512 >/dev/null 2>&1; diff BIMDC/test.bin received/test.bin >/dev/null

tests.name: New channel test (1)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; VAL=$(awk -F, '$1 == "0.016" { print $2 }' BIMDC/12.csv); strace -e trace=openat -o trace.tst ./client -c -p 12 -t 0.016 -e 1 >test.tst 2>/dev/null; grep -qe ${VAL} test.tst && grep -q 'openat(AT_FDCWD, "fifo_data' trace.tst

tests.name: New channel test (2)
tests.run: if ! grep -q 'execve("./server"' server.trace; then exit 1; fi; strace -e trace=openat -o trace.tst ./client -c -f 10.csv -m 1024 >/dev/null 2>&1; diff BIMDC/10.csv received/10.csv >/dev/null && grep -q 'openat(AT_FDCWD, "fifo_data' trace.tst
